message: Let's split it 50/50, a fair start!
You got a good deal in round 1, but I'm willing to give you a slightly better one now!
I'll give you a slightly better deal, but I still want a decent share!
You're getting desperate, so I'll give you a slightly worse deal this time!
I'll give you a bigger share, but I'm not giving up yet!
You're running out of time, so I'll give you a very small share now!
This is my last chance, Bob. I'll give you most of the money, but I'm not going down without a fight!
